data.message: where is  dislike button? we are waiting for it

replies.message: Hey there. We are currently looking into options to provide a range of ways for people to express themselves and are hoping to test something soon. Stay tuned! -Sidney
Please do! That would be wonderful to have dislike buttons
Want!!
Dislike buttons on everything!!
I think it is mean to have a dislike button. People are already mean enough as it is... Will just be another way to tear someone down.
If a dislike button is put on Facebook it should only be allowed on some things so its not hurting people this world is cruel enough
Sometimes dislike might not me mean......for example. My dog died and people were pushing the like button.   Just saying
I'm disliking the fact that it's not ready yet! Lol 👎🏻

They aren't making a 'dislike' button. They're making a 'sympathy' button. It was even on the news. Once again, don't believe everything you read on the internet! The owner of Facebook clearly said he will NOT make a dislike button because of the hostility it will cause.
Let's go for middle ground with a "meh" option.
If someone post that their family member is sick or passes away, you don't wanna like on that, but what options do you have, if you don't want to make a comment?
I think it will be bad because people are fulfilled when they cyber bully
The lack of a dislike button goes well with the saying 'If you can't say anything nice, don't say anything at all.' :)
If a tragedy occurs and you post about it, then there will be a type of 'sympathy' button. READ PEOPLE, READ!
Just leave it, keep scrolling.
I want an *eye roll* button
Can't be that complex. Dislike buttons were here at the beginning.

Sad face button? That sucks... button?.. to dislike is so close to hate....And as a human that is raising another.. there's enough dislike... hate... Please facebook put very good thought into what direction you lead the future  =/
I don't really want one. It can make bullying and being rude even easier haha
Thanks for being fourth right an honest with us.
Agree a dislike button will only lead to more bullying options on fb...
People are just gonna use it to be mean
There's nothing worse than someone telling you their grandma died on FB and people actually "liking" it.
If someone does something you don't like there is this brand new thing called "unfriend".  People are way too butt hurt about things these days.
I'll never forget a conversation him and I when I stayed over after my bypass.he wasn't feeling well and didn't finish poker.I'll tell you about it someday,so your right on Billy will be with me!!!#
